DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether get youth engage help others ( volunteer ) would benefit youth 's physical health . 106 predominantly minority low socioeconomic status ( SES ) youth randomize either volunteer weekly elementary school child school program wait-list control group . The investigator hypothesize cardiovascular risk marker C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , interleukin-6 ( IL-6 ) , total cholesterol , body mass index ( BMI ) would lower post-intervention ( 4 month baseline ) volunteer group compare control group . The investigator also hypothesize intervention might work pathway reduce negative mood , improve self esteem , increase prosocial behavior ( empathy , altruism ) .
DOC.criteria: 10th grade high school student English speaking No chronic illness Chronic medical illness
